dmca.title: DMCA Complaint - 70.86.17.66
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Allen Tsai [mailto:allen.tsai@mobiledia.com] 
Posted At: Sunday, July 09, 2006 4:34 PM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: DMCA Complaint - 70.86.17.66
Subject: DMCA Complaint - 70.86.17.66



Re: Notice of Copyright Infringement 

The Planet

1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110

Dallas, TX 75207

 

Mobiledia Corporation

Sent by: Allen Tsai

7046 W. Santoli Ave.

Las Vegas, NV 89113

443-910-3013

mobiledia@mobiledia.com

Digital Millennium Copyright Act Infringement Notice 

 

Notice of copyright infringement 

1: The copyrighted work at issue appears at mobiledia.com. 

 

2: The offender has stolen our copyrighted material and registered and
scraped several websites (over 700) on domains hosted on 70.86.17.66.
This is a small selection:

 

Offending material:

http://www.motorolav325.net/category/specifications/

http://www.motorolaslvrl7blog.com/category/specifications/

http://www.motorolarazrv3xblog.com/category/specifications/

http://www.motorolav190.com/category/specifications/

http://www.motorolarazrv3iblog.com/category/specifications/

http://www.samsungt809review.com/category/specifications/

 

The above pages contain textual content that has been copied verbatim
from our website.

 

Original material:

http://www.mobiledia.com/phones/motorola/v325.html

http://www.mobiledia.com/phones/motorola/slvr-l7.html

http://www.mobiledia.com/phones/motorola/razr-v3x.html

http://www.mobiledia.com/phones/motorola/v190.html

http://www.mobiledia.com/phones/motorola/razr-v3i.html

http://www.mobiledia.com/phones/samsung/sgh-t809.html

 

 

3. My contact information: 

Mobiledia Corporation

Sent by: Allen Tsai

7046 W. Santoli Ave.

Las Vegas, NV 89113

443-910-3013

mobiledia@mobiledia.com

 

4. Contact information for the infringing party: 

contactprivacy.com,   (nokia6102i.net@contactprivacy.com) 

96 Mowat Ave

Toronto, ON M6K 3M1

CA

+1.4165385457

IP # 70.86.17.66

 

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials
described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized
by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 

 

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed. 

 

Allen Tsai

President

Mobiledia.com
